name: scynett-mircofrontend
description: This is an example of example on how to use [single-spa](https://github.com/CanopyTax/single-spa) && [single-spa-angular-cli](https://github.com/PlaceMe-SAS/single-spa-angular-cli) in a variety of contexts.

scripts.preinstall: cd ./microapps/menu && yarn && cd ../home && yarn && cd ../accounts && yarn
scripts.ng:lint: cd ./microapps/menu && ng lint && cd ../home && ng lint && cd ../accounts && ng lint
scripts.ng:test: cd ./microapps/menu && ng test --watch=false && cd ../home && ng test --watch=false && cd ../accounts && ng test --watch=false
scripts.ng:build: cd ./microapps/menu && ng build --prod -op ../../build/menu && cd ../home && ng build --prod -op ../../build/home && cd ../accounts && ng build --prod -op ../../build/accounts

author: eddyamewu
